Pluses and minuses of nano ownership

After a day of nano ownership, here’s (the first of) my inevitable review(s).

The pluses:

  • Amazing screen – it literally looks like paper, and works well in direct sunlight
  • USB 2.0 is super-fast; noticeable faster than FireWire, for some reason
  • Menu access is faster than previous models
  • Sound-quality is great

The minuses (mostly with iTunes):

  • Can’t leave the nano in the source list (as you can with the shuffle)
  • When using the Manually Update option, you must manually update songs you’ve changed (e.g. by adding album art), which means you can easily create duplicates
  • Similarly, “Show duplicate songs” isn’t supported within the iPod songlist
  • It’s a magnet for fingerprints and scratches (com’on Apple, get those cases shipping!)
